command.name: create

help.short: A name for the replication protected item.
The name of the recovery services vault.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$input.properties.providerSpecificDetails.A2A.vmDisks" options="vm-disks">

<arg type="array" var="$input.properties.providerSpecificDetails.InMage.disksToInclude" options="disks-to-include">

<arg type="array" var="$input.properties.providerSpecificDetails.InMageRcm.disksToInclude" options="disks-to-include">
